description_txt: stated on December 17, 2015 in a column posted on Medium:
quote_txt: "When we held recent economic dialogues with China, we agreed on over 100 different things  —  including wildlife trafficking and volcano research. None of these 100-plus points of agreement addressed cybersecurity."

description_txt: stated on January 4, 2016 in a posting on the Clinton website:

description_txt: stated on August 30, 2015 in an episode of "This Week in Missouri Politics":
quote_txt: Says Missouri needs a voter I.D. law because "there’s over 16 people in the state of Missouri who have been convicted of some type of voter fraud."
